name: Only in New York
description:
Description

New York City is a vibrant, electric, diverse, and beautiful city that is home to over 8 million people. One can call New York home, but you must go through various rites of passages to call yourself a New Yorker. Now you can hear it straight from New Yorkers themselves. 

Heartfelt stories of humanity, plus a lil pizzazz

You arrive at a subway station you've never heard of. Explore this place and listen to NYC-centric stories ranging from the hardships of immigration, the crazy drunk weekends, the scams, and even … pee?

Gameplay

Only in New York is a walking simulator. Use WASD to move and your mouse to control your camera. Click on pictures or objects with the 'PLAY' symbol in order to hear (or watch) the stories.

Only in New York is completely free. Please feel free to donate!

Supports 16 x 9 aspect ratio. Other resolutions may affect how the game looks.
